Articles.Content:
Hello all, I keep having my right-click interface disappearing and I'm unsure why. I'd thought this was due to one of the mods that allows for choosing missions in flight, but that does not appear so now, as the interface keeps disappearing after I've been playing for 15 or so minutes. Was fine at launch, but now gone. Game version is 1.9.1

 

Modlist:

Spoiler

Astronomer's Visual Pack (AstronomersVisualPack 2:v4.04)
Astronomer's Visual Pack-2k Textures (AVP-2kTextures v1.11)
Aviation Lights (AviationLights 1:v4.1.0)
Background Resources (BackgroundResources 1:V0.15.0.0)

Hi ,

 

i have the same Issue :(.

I tried many ways and deinstall one by one my Modlist to find aout what happens?

 

I can say for me it happens when i open the Map with "M" and create a Node. Then i try z.B. to Open the Fairing but the "Right-Click" Menu doesnt show up.

Is there a Mod or what is the Problem.

 

My KSP is 1.10.1

 

Greetings :)
